description:
Christmas is my all-time favorite holiday! It's filled with sparkling lights, delicious food, and plenty of celebrations with family and friends.
But I know it can also be a source of stress for many. And that's especially true for those of us that are trying to pull together a fully plant-based celebration!
But I'm here to show you that Christmas can be just as delicious with a table full of vegan dishes! So I've pulled together all my favorite Christmas dinner table worthy recipes in this handy e-book. So you can have a complete vegan feast at your fingertips, without spending hours scouring the internet!
Whether you're planning a completely plant based holiday, or are just looking for a few special vegan-friendly dishes to round out your holiday menu, you'll find everything you need to make your celebration delicious!


What's Included?
The Vegan Christmas CookbookÂ is packed full of plant based recipes that are fit for a holiday feast.
Start your holiday menu with vegan-friendly appetizers like:

Smoky Vegan Cheddar Cheez
Cranberry and Pecan Vegan "Cheese Ball"
Lemon, Thyme, and Garlic Marinated Mushrooms

Impress your guests with show-stopping vegan main dishes such as:

Mushroom Wellington
Vegan Paella
Mushroom and Cauliflower Shepherd's Pies
Cranberry Spaghetti Squash
Miso Glazed Eggplant
Greek Moussaka
One-Pot Vegan Jambalaya
Spaghetti Mushroom Bolognese

Add on these incredible vegan soups and side dishes to round out your holiday menu:

Farro & Eggplant with Sun Dried Tomato Pesto
One-Pot Creamy Potato Soup
Tuscan Bean Soup
Vegan Carrot Soup
Kale with Fennel, Cranberries, and Walnuts
Moroccan Chickpea Salad
Rosemary Roasted Mushrooms
Crispy Roast Potatoes
Loaded Sweet Potatoes with Spicy Black Beans and Cashew-Lime Cream
Creamy Mashed Potatoes and Onion Gravy
Rosemary Roasted Carrots
Glazed Baked Onions
Easy Vegan Meatballs

And finish the meal with a little something sweet:

Vegan Sugar Cookies
Peppermint Chocolatte
Bay, Thyme, and Agave Roasted Pears
Vegan Biscotti
Vegan Coffee Cake
Vegan Pound Cake
Easy Vegan Cheesecake
Quick Cinnamon Raisin Bread
Chai Spiced Cranberry Apple Pie

There's a little something for everyone in this delicious collection of recipes. And while I put this book together with Christmas in mind, you'll likely find yourself cooking these dishes all year long. They're that irresistible. ðŸ˜‰

FAQs
What format is the book in?
The book will be delivered as a PDF download. It's designed to be read on your computer, mobile device, or printed out.
Can I print the book?
Absolutely! In fact, I encourage you to print it out. Stick it in a three-ring binder, and keep it in your kitchen for easy reference.
How many times can I download the book?
As many times as you want. I lose stuff too! ðŸ˜‰
Â Are any of the recipes available on your website?
Some of the recipes are available elsewhere and some of them are exclusive to this book.
I already have the Vegan Thanksgiving Cookbook. Are these recipes the same or different?
The Vegan Christmas Cookbook contains completely different recipes, with one exception. The Mushroom Wellington appears in both books - it's a reader favorite for both holidays!
What is the refund policy?
We don't offer refunds on digital products, as it unfortunately attracts fraud. But frankly, I've never been asked for one anyway. If you're not happy with the book, email me personally atÂ nicole@ohmyveggies.comÂ and I will do my best to make it right!
name: Vegan Christmas Cookbook
